vendeloo

The table stakes. We’re grown-ups with decades (dec-ades) of experience counseling hundreds of clients in marketing, communications, and other strategic business challenges.

The raise. We’re professional writers, published authors, artists and designers. We’re world travelers, global citizens, and humanitarians. We’re explorers, investigators, and voracious consumers of information.

Our guts are strong, our contexts great, and our perspectives wide. We look far ahead and always think sideways, taking nothing for granted.

We’re an extension of your team, moving quickly to help identify and solve problems, constructing and delivering on strategic, pragmatic plans that affect change.

Whether we’re helping you find your voice, or developing your wholesale network, we make things happen. Resourcefulness is our superpower. Integrity is our credo. Efficient excellence is our game.

about

Formed in 2001, Vendeloo is a bespoke, boutique-sized, New Orleans-based consultancy focused on management consulting, marketing, and communications.

Vendeloo provides an intimate level of service, while partnering with an international network of resources to fully support clients on a global basis, solving strategic business challenges for both emerging and well-established B2B, B2C, and B2H companies and brands across myriad industries, media, and non-profits.

Vendeloo limits the number of clients we consult with at one time and we staff our consultancy exclusively with senior executives.
